entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 24 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
